title.native: テラフォーマーズ リベンジ

description:
The second season of Terra Formars.

In Terra Formars Revenge, the crew members of the Annex I continue to fight against Terraformars—the large humanoid cockroaches that evolved from the ones sent to Mars centuries ago. However, far from discovering the cure for the lethal Alien Engine Virus that has been plaguing Earth, the Annex I team have learned that some squadrons have agendas from their own countries. Now, the squadrons must not only fight against the Terraformars for their survival, but also each other in the never-ending battle for international dominance.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/荒川稔久)

Married to fellow scriptwriter [Hiroko Naka](https://anilist.co/staff/181820/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/福田道生)

Originating from [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). Debuted as a director on [Hyakko](https://anilist.co/anime/4550/).

[Website](https://www.seikima-ii.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/seikima_ii35th) | [Sony Music](https://www.sonymusic.co.jp/artist/SeikimaII/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/seikima_ii/)

Japanese heavy metal band founded by [Demon Kogure](https://anilist.co/staff/106416). The band disbanded at the end of the century on December 31, 1999 at 23:59:59, but have since made several limited reunion appearances.

__Members:__
• His Excellency [Demon Kakka](https://anilist.co/staff/106416) (デーモン閣下) – vocals
• His Imperial Highness Raiden Yuzawa (ライデン湯沢殿下) – drums
• Doctor Xenon Ishikawa (ゼノン石川和尚) – bass, backing vocals
• Staff General Luke Takamura III (Sgt. ルーク篁III世参謀) – guitar, backing vocals
• Empire Magistrate Jail O'Hashi (ジェイル大橋代官) – guitar, backing vocals
• Captain Ace Shimizu (エース清水長官) – guitar (1983–1999, 2005), drums (1982–1983)

__Former members:__
• His Majesty Damian Hamada (ダミアン浜田) – guitar (1982–1985)
• Majo Ryoko (魔女RYO子嬢) – keyboards (1983)
• Giantonio Babayashi (ジャントニオ・ババヤシ) – guitar (1984)
• Zeed Iijima (ジード飯島大将) – drums (1983–1985)
• Gandhara Sangeria Tigris-Euphrates Kaneko (ガンダーラ・サンゲリア・チグリス・ユーフラテス金子) – guitar (1985; died 2012)
• Jagy Furukawa (ジャギ古川CAP) – drums (1985)
• Zod Hoshijima (ゾッド星島親分) – bass (1982–1986)

__Support members:__
• Wrector H (レクター・H) – keyboards (1992–1994)
• Yuichi Matsuzaki (怪人松崎様) – keyboards (1988–1992, 1994–1999, 2005, 2010, 2015–2016)

**Graduated:** Waseda University, Faculty of Letters 1

**Satomi Tetsurou** is a Japanese producer and animation planner, who also provides planning assistance to various works. He is also the president of Barnum Studio, and the representative director for LIDENFILMS.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/52717833)
Takafumi Wada is a Japanese Composer.
